DOC.brief_summary: In randomize , double-blind clinical trial include patient neurogenic low urinary tract dysfunction undergo urodynamic investigation Spinal Cord Injury Center , Balgrist University Hospital , Zürich , aim investigate whether detrusor contraction ice-water-test provoke ice water rapid filling .
DOC.detailed_description: The ice-water-test ( IWT ) first described 1957 Bors Blinn think differentiate lesion upper low motoneuron . In cat study , show IWT C-fiber mediate low motoneuron segmental reflex unmyelinated C fiber associate cold receptor . This explain positive IWT patient upper motoneuron lesion . In healthy human , IWT positive age 4 year becomes negative thereafter since reflex centrally inhibit . However , reflex might unmask neurological disease and/or injury . Considering C-fibers involve pathogenesis detrusor overactivity , IWT seem useful diagnostic tool daily practice . However , although many study publish IWT , unclear whether detrusor contraction IWT provoke ice water whether might cause rapid filling . Therefore , design randomize , double-blind trial .
DOC.criteria: neurogenic low urinary tract dysfunction urodynamic investigation write informed consent ≥ 18 year old symptomatic urinary tract infection < 18 year old ≥ 90 year old write informed consent pregnancy
